content.question: The Reagan Revolution of the early 1980s entailed

choices.label: tax cuts for low-income Americans and expansion of social welfare programs
tax cuts for the wealthiest Americans and increases in defense spending
a free-trade policy with European nations

content.answer: tax cuts for the wealthiest Americans and increases in defense spending

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
